**Tender Description:**

Defence Construction Canada invites proposals from architectural or engineering consulting firms to provide technical advisory services for the Canadian Surface Combatant Construction project in Halifax, NS, and Esquimalt, BC. The services encompass technical advisory, cost estimating, site planning, and other related services. Interested firms must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date.

**Evaluation Criteria:** Proposals will be evaluated based on established criteria, including security requirements, technical capabilities, and qualifications of the proposer.

**Security Requirements:** Interested parties are encouraged to review the security requirements outlined in the tender documents.

**Proposal Submission:** Interested firms must submit their proposals through the MERX Electronic Bidding System prior to the closing date and time. Proposers may obtain contract award results from the Defence Construction Canada website at [Contract Activity](https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/contract-activity).

**Important Dates:**
- Publication Date: August 8, 2022
- Tender Closing Date: October 7, 2022
